attributes.action: Bring in a "Drinking License" without which alchohol may not be bought or consumed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some 70% of drinkers actually want to stop drinking. So if you just make it that little bit more difficult for them to actually re-start or even to start in the first place it will make a big difference.

Some people would be deterred from drinking alchohol if they had to make the effort to fill in a complicated form, get a photograph taken and pay a charge.

It's a little bit of a problem to actually do it, so you have got to make a conscious decision every year to opt in to being a drinker.

The cost savings to the NHS would be enormous.
